data.message: How about  you  validate the fact  you're  replacing a 500+   year old  tradition by bringing  that monstrosity  into  Chester,  you disgust me, my daughter  was supposed to  be taking part in Chester  winter watch  parade for the first  time, I parade  in it  separately, many small  arts  collectives  get paid  for this  by the local council  yet  you  get to bully  us out of it... why?
